captions.text:
and I have to say that it has been an amazing year
full of events and adventures
and I thank you all for the support that you've been showing.
I promise you an even more entertaining year to come

so make sure to subscribe to my YouTube
channel because
there's lots of exciting things planned for the future, ciao!

title: BEST of Supercar Sounds 2014 - 10 minutes of PURE Sounds!
